titles.title: Freedom to Invest in a Sustainable Future Act
Freedom to Invest in a Sustainable Future Act
To amend the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 to permit retirement plans to consider certain factors in investment decisions.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary:
Freedom to Invest in a Sustainable Future Act
This bill provides statutory authority for fiduciaries of employer-sponsored retirement plans to consider environmental, social, governance, or similar factors when making investment decisions.
